name: Lip
text: I can't believe what I see!

name: You
text: You call that a SMALL ISSUE?!

name: Lip
text: So you must be the chosen one, sent by the gods, praised by the lords.

name: You
text: What were those Small, ugly, dark, crawling creatures?

name: Lip
text: I shall tell you the whole story, now that you have proven yourself.

name: Lip
text: I call them inklings and the ones you just defeated were just a small part of the problem.

name: Lip
text: There are a lot more spread around the world, and not just Inklings...

name: Lip
text: Unfortunately this was just the beginning.

name: Lip
text: They want to destroy all of the art on earth by smearing it in their dark ink...
